dmca.title: [ABUSE] www.tibia4players.friko.pl
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 17, 2005 1:58 PM
To: schneider@cipsoft.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] www.tibia4players.friko.pl

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Nicole Schneider <schneider@cipsoft.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Thursday, March 17, 2005, 6:06:40 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] www.tibia4players.friko.pl

===8<==============Original message text=============== March 17, 2005


Dear Sirs and Madams:

The internet address www.tibia4players.friko.pl is assigned to your address
area.

Apart from the fact that this side offends against the copyright rules of
our official web side www.tibia.com, this reproduction of our web side is
used to obtain secret account data from our customers.

We ask you to remove the side www.tibia4players.friko.pl immediately from
the internet.

For further questions please feel free to contact me via email.

Yours sincerely,

Nicole Schneider
CipSoft GmbH




===8<===========End of original message text=========== -----BEGIN PGP
SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCOeFVvK/XpJs6oyURAo+iAKCJTip36vsVKcIMkj2A1u7Bpi3g8ACcDWiZ
0Tv0WYWYwrEDYscmNzuRZGs=
=hsoT
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
